title: Katyn
writer: Andrzej Mularczyk (story), Przemyslaw Nowakowski (screenplay), Wladyslaw Pasikowski (screenplay), Andrzej Wajda (screenplay)
actors: Andrzej Chyra, Maja Ostaszewska, Artur Zmijewski, Danuta Stenka
plot: An examination of the Soviet slaughter of thousands of Polish officers and citizens in the Katyn forest in 1940.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 14 wins & 11 nominations.
